text:
They do have one of the best selections of ink pens anywhere, I will give them that! I always stop in at Evergreen for my faves and to see what else they might have to tempt me.
This shop is where you'll find lined hardbound notebooks (several sizes and in different cover designs) ready to fill with your words or scribbles. You'll find envelopes, folders, pencils, some paints, papers of all kinds, stickers, wrapping paper sheets and more.
The only unpleasantness is that the shop is very compact and aisles are so narrow they practically don't exist, but I guess that's what's good too, as they can pack a ton of stuff in a small space.

Mr Tan was super helpful. I had an urgent order and it was delivered within 4 working days even though it had to be ordered from their supplier. Throughout the process he was friendly and patient. Great staff!

Ms.Cathy of evergreen stationary shop at Paya Lebar Square has provided excellent service to our company stationary requirements and she has the professional and astute approach towards all the customers visiting the shop. She has good display of all the items in the shop with more varieties. She is real good role model for this shop.
There is a Filipino guy with glasses about 175cm with bad attitude and short tempered who did not offer help to customer instead bad mouthing about them.
Never go down to this shop for printing. Expensive, extremely slow service and incapable staffs.
